sn9.3:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma kassapagotto kosalesu viharati annatarasmim vanasande.
sn9.3:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma kassapagotto divaviharagato annataram chetam ovadati.
sn9.3:1.3: Atha kho ya tasmim vanasande adhivattha devata ayasmantam kassapagottam samvejetukama yenayasma kassapagotto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam kassapagottam gathahi ajjhabhasi:
sn9.3:5.1: Atha kho ayasma kassapagotto taya devataya samvejito samvegamapaditi.
